title: How big is the e-book self-publishing industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: E book publishing industry is as big as paperback or hardcover publishing industry or even larger. Right from smallest traditional presses to the mega giant publisher all of them have their books available in e book format simultaneously along with other formats. Free ebook publishing platforms like Amazon Kindle, Kobo, Smashwords and other ebook publishers have made it even easier to publish ebook while the fact that it’s every easy to publish them makes it even more comfortable for the authors making the ebook industry very wide. Infact self publishing ebook industry is so wide that paperback seems to be a smaller version of it. Few big publishers even have special ebook imprints like Avon of Harpercollins and Penguin Metro which publish ebooks for trial with sales before paperback publishing.
